name: Spongebob's Basics in Education and Cooking - Extra Spoopy Edition
name_original: Spongebob's Basics in Education and Cooking - Extra Spoopy Edition
description:
My original Spongebob's basics was getting some popularity! So I made an extra spoopy edition.

Things in the spoopy edition:

Darker School

Everybody looks more spoopy

Breaking texture

(im sorry if i was a bit rushed and lazy)
